cause.description:
Theresa is a 17 year old girl, going to college and working full time, sounds normal right? well theresa has been through alot in her life, her father was abusive and left her alone with her family, who also hates her. she has been alone in the world and now she has desided that she needs to start her life. she is very scared but she knows whta she has to do
She has asked me (Relation:Best friend/lovers) to help her make her new place look like a home, so i need help with money to buy her a futon
Please help us!
1. Theresa needs help
2. Theresa is awesome
3. We love theresa
cause.name: Theresas Futon
